str2: A lord, master, or prince. Perhaps from deo and posis; an absolute ruler.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and luo; to free fully, i.e. relieve, release, dismiss, or let die, pardon or divorce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
